This is a full-time position with competitive benefits. What you'll be doing 1. Desktop and system technical support, including: Provide installation, configuration, troubleshooting and performance optimisation of operating systems and software/hardware for internal users. Manage enterprise software licensing, driver updates and patch deployment (e.g. WSUS, ManageEngine). Responsible for software/hardware asset management including equipment procurement, inventory, obsolescence, and maintenance record updates. Proficient in Windows Server and Linux system installation, administration and troubleshooting. Hands-on experience with VMware vSphere or Nutanix virtualisation platform. Experience with router/switch/firewall management (VLAN, ACL, static routing, firewall policy configuration). Experience in IT asset management, including hardware maintenance, software licence tracking and asset inventory. Good communication skills and high sense of responsibility. Interested parties please send your full resume with current salary, expected salary and availability to us by clicking "QUICK APPLY". title: ICT Technician - West Island School
description: Job Description West Island School (WIS) is seeking to appoint an ICT Technician. This is a permanent full-time position with medical and MPF benefits active for 10.5 months with MPF benefits, summer break will be unpaid leave. Role Summary To manage and provide first-line technical support to students and staff laptops & ICT equipment at WIS To oversee help desk operations and maintain inventory, ensuring efficient resolution of technical issues Responsibilities Responsible for the management and support of all laptops at West Island School including day- to- day support, damage claims and loaner issues Responsible for recording, documenting, resolving and tracking all helpdesk jobs via the online ticketing system To act as the first line of technical support for students and staff Responsible for laptop image preparation and maintenance Technical support, maintenance and inventory of all classroom ICT equipment such as projectors, visualizers, desktops, laptops & accessories Perform other duties and assume accountabilities as apparent or as delegated including mutually agreed-upon objectives Reporting To: ICT Manager Requirements Experience: Entry level or 1-2 years in a similar role Customer service experience is an advantage Fresh graduates will also be considered Abilities & Knowledge: Strong English communication abilities Ability to troubleshoot day- to- day problems encountered by IT users on a Windows or Mac platform is essential Working knowledge of Windows and Mac OS is essential Working knowledge of the Internet and related applications is essential Working knowledge of network troubleshooting is desirable Excellent interpersonal, communication and organisational skills A friendly manner in relation to staff and students is essential Flexibility and the ability to manage a range of different tasks simultaneously Ability to adapt to new situations and to learn new skills is essential Ability to work under pressure and good team player is essential Proactive and use initiative Applicants must be permanent Hong Kong residents or possess a valid visa to work in Hong Kong. For enquiries, please contact Rathi NandaKumar @ 28191962 or Email: rathi.nandakumar@wis.edu.hk. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and offers may be extended prior to the job closing date. We strongly recommend early applications as we reserve the right to appoint candidates earlier than the closing date. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and offers may be extended prior to the job closing date. By applying for this position, your application may be considered for other opportunities (senior-level roles, head of department, etc.) within ESF. ESF is an Equal Opportunities Employer The English Schools Foundation (ESF) is fully committed to providing equal employment opportunities. ESF will not discriminate on the basis of age, race, colour, gender, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, pregnancy, national origin, religion, veteran status, physical or mental disability, genetic information, creed, citizenship or any other status protected by local laws or regulations. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used strictly in accordance with the ESF's Personal Data Policy, a copy of which will be provided upon request. ESF is dedicated to ensuring the safety and well-being of all students in our care and expects all applicants to uphold this commitment. We adhere to rigorous recruitment practices, with all appointments contingent upon an interview, identity verification, criminal background checks (including ICPC, SCRC, and other international background checks as appropriate), assessment of social media presence, and positive references. In accordance with the Keeping Children Safe in Education (KCSIE) 2025 guidelines, ESF may perform online checks for all shortlisted candidates prior to the interview. SupportstaffIT SupportStaff About Us The English Schools Foundation (ESF) is the largest English-medium international school organisation in Hong Kong. Our 22 schools and comprehensive programme of extra-curricular activities bring out the best in every student through a personalised approach to learning and by inspiring curious minds. There are over 18,000 students from 75 different nationalities in ESF kindergartens, primary, secondary and all-through schools. www.esf.edu.hk About the Team West Island School is a world class co-educational IB World School with a leading reputation in Hong Kong. Our school motto “Strength from Diversity” reflects that the school caters for students from over 40 nationalities. The school has a strong focus on developing responsible global citizenship teaching through the UN Sustainable Development Goals. Courage, compassion and service beyond the classroom define our students. We have a reputation for academic excellence and the vast majority of students graduate to a range of leading worldwide universities after completing the IBDP or IBCP programme. In 2020, our average score for the IB Diploma was 37, and 29% of students achieved 40 points or more. Extracurricular activities are offered termly through an extensive CAS programme (Community, Activity and Service). We have a strong focus on pastoral care to support the whole development of young people. http://www.wis.edu.hk

title: System and Network Engineer
description: YesStyle is looking for passionate talents, who love and appreciate the fascination of Asian fashion and beauty. Our team is active, energetic, and culturally diverse. To embrace the idea of work-life balance, we also endeavor to create a fun and enjoyable environment for our team members. Objective of the Position: Provide 2nd tier technical support, support team for daily system & network infrastructure operations. Diagnose, troubleshoot, and fix system and network problems. Project implementation & daily operations of system install & configure, testing and change request, etc. To provide technical advice & expertise in network infrastructure design, configuration, and project deployment. Conduct system and network changes and patch update process. Assist infrastructure ad hoc tasks. What You'll Do: Plan, design, and implement system and network solutions for different environments including data center networks, LAN, wireless LAN, WAN network infrastructure, SD-WAN and perimeter network security solutions. Manage testing and certifying of network designs, products, and/or services. Independently perform technical tasks including network solution design, project implementation, network diagram preparation and UAT testing. Collaborate with cross-functional teams in the project What You Have: Diploma in computer information technology or equivalent. At least 3 years of experience in technical support and administration for windows and Linux platform. Certificate Holders of CCNA, CCNP, FCA or MCSE is a plus. Be a good team player and able to learn. Proven ability to communicate in Chinese and English. Willing to work after office hours and travel when necessary. Candidates with more experience will be considered for Senior role. Knowledge of TCP/IP, Switch and Router (layer 2 & 3), Policy based routing, OSPF, BGP, MPLS and DIA technologies, load balancing, network resilience and redundant design, network segmentation, network performance monitoring & diagnosis. Understanding of networking concepts: TCP/IP, LAN/WAN, DHCP, DNS, Routing, Switching/Firewall. Experience working with Fortinet Firewall/ H3C switches. Experience with virtualization software. Good analytical, problem solving and communication skills. Able to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines. What You'll Enjoy: 5 Days Work Dynamic, International Cultural & Friendly Working Environment Performance Bonus Medical / Dental Insurance Staff Purchase Discount Program Training Programs Team Member's Wellness Program Annual Leave, Full Pay Sick Leave, Birthday Leave, Examination Leave The more you put into your career at YesStyle, the more opportunities you’ll receive. Throughout your time in the Company, you’ll be assessed on the core competencies of your position and prepared for the next level of your development. Your role at YesStyle should progress naturally as you move from assistant grade to management, taking on challenges and responsibilities suited to your unique skills and talents. Please send your full resume stating your current and expected salary to Human Resource Department for application. To know more about us, please visit www.yesstyle.com. title: Senior IT Specialist
description: We are a Hong Kong-based company with a strong presence in Hong Kong and Southeast Asia, operating multiple retail stores. Committed to innovation and operational efficiency, we are looking for an IT Specialist to join our team and oversee IT hardware, network, and system support across our headquarters and retail locations. Job Responsibilities · Manage and maintain IT hardware, network, and infrastructure for the Hong Kong headquarter and retail stores in HK and APAC. · Administer and monitor in-house servers and networks (including maintenance, troubleshooting, backups, and performance optimization). · Coordinate and oversee local IT vendors in retail locations, ensuring timely resolution of hardware, network, and system issues. · Provide technical support to employees, troubleshooting hardware-related problems (e.g., computers, printers, networking devices). · Assist in improving IT processes to enhance system reliability and security. · Occasionally travel to Southeast Asian stores for on-site support or vendor coordination (low frequency). Requirements · Degree holder in Computer Science, Information Systems or related field is required · Minimum 4 years of experience in IT support or system administration, with server management experience preferred. · Proficiency in Windows/Linux servers, networking equipment (routers, switches, etc.), and office hardware. · Strong problem-solving skills and ability to handle IT emergencies independently. · Fluent in English and Cantonese, with good Mandarin skills for effective communication with regional teams and vendors. · Detail-oriented, responsible, and a good team player · Proactive, energetic, and positive attitude. We offer 5-day work, good working conditions and others benefit package to the right candidate. Interested parties please apply with your resume in MS Word /PDF format with current salary, expected salary and available date.

title: Senior Application Engineer – PRIM Applications
description: Senior Application Engineer – PRIM Applications General Description OMICRON is a leading manufacturer of primary and secondary test equipment for power systems. Our products are used in more than 160 countries by electric power plants, companies operating high-voltage transmission lines, switchgear, medium-voltage distribution networks and industrial plants. OMICRON stands for excellent customer support as an additional strong differentiation to our competition. With more than 1,100 employees worldwide, we strive to create the best place to work. We are seeking a technically proficient Senior Application Engineer – PRIM Applications to join our Asia Regional Application Specialist Team. This role focuses on providing advanced technical support, conducting diagnostic testing, and delivering training related to high voltage assets, including power transformers, instrument transformers, switchgear, rotating machines, and ancillary equipment. The position is to be located in our OMICRON Service Center in Hong Kong. Your responsibilities · Technical Support & Diagnostics: o Provide expert-level technical support for OMICRON products and services, particularly in primary testing and diagnostic equipment for high voltage assets. o Conduct on-site diagnostic measurements and guide customers through testing procedures. o Support measurement data analysis and assist in evaluating power system apparatus conditions. · Training & Knowledge Transfer: o Develop and deliver training sessions on electrical theory, diagnostic methods, and application of OMICRON equipment. o Create technical documentation and application notes to support customer understanding and effective use of products. o Support the marketing & sales activities of OMICRON by actively performing on-site sales demos, participating in trade shows, user meetings and workshops. · Product & Application Expertise: o Stay updated on the latest diagnostic techniques and tools relevant to high voltage equipment. o Collaborate with product development teams to provide feedback on product performance and customer requirements. · Regional Coordination: o Support regional initiatives by contributing technical expertise to workshops, user meetings, and other events. o Assist in coordinating technical activities across application fields such as instrument transformers, power transformers, and circuit breakers. · Business development & sales support o Proactively conduct customer visits to support sales of primary testing and diagnostic equipment for high voltage assets. o Collaborate with the BDO Prim team on technical business development initiatives, including the evaluation of new diagnostic technologies, development of application strategies for high-voltage assets. Your profile · Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field. · Minimum of 7 years of experience in power systems, with a focus on diagnostic testing and monitoring of high voltage assets. · Proficiency in diagnostic methods such as Power Factor (PF), Sweep Frequency Response Analysis (SFRA), Dissolved Gas Analysis (DGA), Dielectric Frequency Response Analysis (DFR), and Partial Discharge (PD). · Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret complex technical data. · Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information effectively. · Willingness to travel up to 50% of the time. · Strong interpersonal and presentation skills, self-driven with a great sense of responsibility and capability to work independently. · Enjoy working in a small team environment with international roots. · Positive, proactive and being a good team player. · Good organizational, problem-solving and multi-tasking skills. Preferred Qualifications: · Experience with OMICRON testing solutions. · Familiarity with regional standards and practices in high voltage diagnostics. · Multilingual abilities, Mandarin, are advantageous. This is not an exhaustive list of all duties and responsibilities. OMICRON reserves the right to amend and change responsibilities to meet business and organizational needs, as necessary. OMICRON distinguishes itself by: • Not just offering a position, but an opportunity for growth and development in an international multi-cultural company. • Having fun while working as a part of a professional team. • Encouraging personal initiative through flat hierarchies. • Our extraordinary corporate culture and strong commitment to a healthy "work-life-balance." • Offering an attractive benefit package. OMICRON provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, nationality, or origin, age, or disability. If interested in becoming part of the OMICRON team, please submit your resume and cover letter with your expected salary to jobs.asia@omicronenergy.com. We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Technology Specialist - Server Engineer
description: Responsibilities Provide technical guidance to teammates and technical support to clients Act as IT infrastructure senior Level II / subject matter expert / Level III engineer on solving different IT infrastructure problems Act as escalation point for other team members on IT infrastructure problems Actively monitor client’s infrastructures and execute preventive measures to prevent problems / issues from happening Work with helpdesk team leader on providing top level service to our clients in a timely and professional manner Provide infrastructure advice both internally and to clients on improving system efficacy, stability, performance and security Collaborate with teammates to design and implement technology solutions and projects Develop junior teammates on technical skill sets Maintain update records of client’s IT infrastructure Understand and deploy company culture and standards Remains contactable via phone out of office hours Flexible on work hours including weekend and public holidays Perform other ad-hoc tasks as assigned Requirements Diploma or above in Information Technology, Software Engineering or related fields Fluency in written and spoken English is mandatory; Fluency in spoken Mandarin would be an advantage Ability to deliver results in an efficient manner in constrained timeframes Able to work under stress Solid and strong hands on experience on Microsoft Windows Service technologies is a must Solid and strong experience with multi-sites infrastructure deployment Solid and strong hands on experience on IT infrastructure including servers, storages, data backups, replications network, UPS, etc. Strong troubleshooting skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, within the company and at all levels of clients Work Experience Requirements Minimum 5 years' experience in a technology support role, with minimum 3 years' experience in a senior engineer role Experience in a service provider environment is preferred Trade floor or financial services IT experience is an advantage Certificate holder of MCSE / MCITP, Microsoft MS / AZ, VCAP, VCP, CISSP, CISA, etc. is a plus We offer competitive salary and package for the right candidate. Interested parties please provide detailed resume stating current and expected salary on CV by clicking "Apply Now". All personal data collected will be treated in strict confidence and only be used for recruitment purposes. Applicants who do not hear from us within 8 weeks from the date of application may consider their applications unsuccessful and their information will be destroyed within 12 months of receipt.

title: Technical support Engineer / Assistant engineer 通訊技術服務工程師 / 助理工程師
description: 人數：2人 職位職責: 公司卫星通信專案、產品、服務的售前售中售後的技術支援工作。為客戶提供高質量技術服務，為業務拓展部門開拓市場提供技術支援。 實施公司卫星通信及資訊科技系統集成類專案的有關工程，產品的交付、安裝、系統調試和技術服務工作。 參與研究制定公司解決方案及服務的完善和創新，提出並落實衛星應用系統、資訊化行業應用方案。 負責公司技術資料的完善及內外部技術培訓。 其他涉及技術範疇的交辦工作。 任職條件： 具有通信、計算機、資訊科技類等理工科大學本科以上學歷（如條件優秀，副學士可考慮）; 不限年資，具有卫星通信相關工作經驗优先考虑（如經驗不足，可考慮錄取為助理工程師）。 具備通信、計算機、資訊化技術等有關知識和經驗;瞭解通信設備等系統的運作和操作、增值應用的能力。 工作語言為英文、普通話、廣東話。 需要往中國大陸及國外出差。

title: Helpdesk Support Specialist
description: Responsibilities: Provide technical assistance and support for incoming queries and issues related to computer systems, software, and hardware. Install, modify, and repair computer hardware and software. Resolve technical problems with Local Area Networks (LAN), Wide Area Networks (WAN), and other systems. Set up accounts for new users and assist with password resets. Maintain records of system updates, upgrades, and configurations. Offer guidance to end-users on how to operate new software and computer equipment. Assist in the organization's IT security measures, including antivirus and firewall systems. Collaborate with the IT team to ensure smooth functioning of all systems and applications. Troubleshoot system and network problems and diagnose and solve hardware or software faults. Stay up-to-date with advancements in technology and best practices in IT support. Requirements: Proven work experience as an IT Support Specialist or similar role. Proficiency in computer systems, network functions, and software applications. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to diagnose and resolve technical issues. Strong communication abilities with a customer-oriented approach. Knowledge of IT security protocols and data protection practices. Certification in IT or relevant field is a plus. Ability to work well in a team environment. Flexibility to work outside of regular business hours when necessary.

title: IT Officer
description: Key Responsibilities Performing hardware and software procurement, installations, configuration and IT housekeeping. Collaborate with Headquarter IT team to implement global and local IT infrastructure projects according to Ascott’s standard. Responsible for daily IT supporting and training jobs by providing the IT helpdesk and technical support in hardware and software to all users in the property during and after opening. Maintain and implement web applications and associated infrastructure & information distribution channels to guests. Monitor and maintain performance on system, server, network or other IT Communication related projects or tasks as assigned. Install hardware, system and application software according to end user requirements and perform troubleshooting as required. Negotiate the external vendors and contractors for infrastructure-specific products and services. Prepare technical documentations or reports, Participate IT audits are required. Manage and monitor IT infrastructure budget. Job Requirements Certificate or above in Computer Science or IT related field. Good knowledge of troubleshooting in IT area. Hands on experience, strong office & project organizational skills, attention to detail, time management and communication skills. Demonstrated consultation and strong communication ability. Hospitality experience would be added value.
